SECTION I – EXCLUSIONS Exclusion A.10. is added. 10. "Fungi", Wet Or Dry Rot, Or Bacteria "Fungi", Wet Or Dry Rot, Or Bacteria meaning the presence, growth, proliferation, spread or any ac- tivity of "fungi", wet or dry rot, or bacteria. This exclusion does not apply: a. When "fungi", wet or dry rot, or bacteria results from fire or lightning; or b. To the extent coverage is provided for in the "Fungi", Wet Or

r dry rot, or bacteria. This exclusion does not apply: a. When "fungi", wet or dry rot, or bacteria results from fire or lightning; or b. To the extent coverage is provided for in the "Fungi", Wet Or Dry Rot, Or Bacteria Additional Coverage under Section I – Property Cover- ages with respect to loss caused by a Peril In- sured Against other than fire or lightning. Direct loss by a Peril Insured Against resulting from "fungi", wet or dry rot, or bacteria is cov- ered.
